exited with code 0 {code} Here also there is a mapping issue. Seems like a an issue with DOCKER rather than HYPERLEDGER. >

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: ~Amjadnz Are you using the getting started download or building from source?

Action.author: weeds
Action.body: Added Amjad as owner in hope that he will answer where he is following instructions. Thanks.

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: ~Amjadnz can you please respond to my question above? Would like more information on which version and how you were running the sample.

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: May I ask which commit level you're at? Also, which version of MacOSX? I've tried this many times and cannot recreate. Have you tried building from a more recent commit?

Action.author: amjadnz
Action.body: Date: Tue May 30 10:59:01 2017 +0000 Merge " FAB-4116 core/policy test coverage" {code} >

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: I'd recommend that you pull a more current commit level or use the published release binaries and images. The script.sh has never been missing from the repository, so I can't imagine why it would be missing in your clone unless you deleted it.

Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: ~Amjadnz Are you using Docker for Mac or Docker Toolbox?

Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: I'll take this as I think we need to add some troubleshooting or FAQ about Docker Toolbox (and Docker for Mac / Windows as well) when it comes to mounting volumes
